gameDetails.name: Dune: Imperium â€“ Duncan, Loyal Blade Promo Card
gameDetails.description:
A promo card offered by Dire Wolf to customers who pre-ordered the Dune: Imperium - Deluxe Upgrade Pack.

Is included in Dune Imperium Promo Pack 1

Agent Ability: Recruit a troop.

Reveal ability: Gain one persuasion and two battle points.
When this card is trashed -> Deploy or retreat any number of your troops from or to your garrison.
